definitions.definition: An order by the government prohibiting ships from leaving port .
A ban on trade with another country.
A temporary ban on making certain information public.
examples: This copy of the federal budget is under embargo until 2 p.m.

definitions.definition: A heavy burden or severe constraint on action or expenditure.

main_definition: An order by the government prohibiting ships from leaving port .
secondary_definitions: A ban on trade with another country.
A temporary ban on making certain information public.
A heavy burden or severe constraint on action or expenditure.
